page.title: 14Living in High Littleton.
page.content: {Living in High Littleton by an 8 year {old. I like living in High Littleton because there's lots of room to play,not by the main roads but in the fields.There are many fields and they are very big.You can play on your bikes up the lanes.There are lots of steep fields where you can go on your toboggan when its snowing.The field we go in is very steep and it has got lots of big bumps in it.There are lots of my friends in the village.There is a river too,where you can go for walks.There's the woods where you can go for long walks.There are shops near by and there are lots of them.There isn't anything really that I don't like about living here.
